name: Soil Health & Land Management
description: Seeks to facilitate the adoption of agricultural practices that build, rather than degrade, soils by increasing soil organic matter, biodiversity, and fertility.

name: Animal Welfare
description: Seeks to ensure humane practices in the raising and/or handling of animals that intend to be sold or marketed using Regenerative Organic CertifiedÂ® claims.

name: Farmer & Worker Fairness
description: Seeks economic stability and fairness for farmers, ranchers, and workers.
